verses.verse: A Psalm of David. <WH1732> To you will I cry, <WH7121> O LORD <WH3068> my rock; <WH6697> be not silent <WH2790> to me: lest, <WH6435> if you be silent <WH2790> to me, I become <WH4911> like <WH5973> them that go <WH3381> down <WH3381> into the pit. <WH953>
Hear <WH8085> the voice <WH6963> of my supplications, <WH8469> when I cry <WH7768> to you, when I lift <WH5375> up my hands <WH3027> toward <WH413> your holy <WH6944> oracle. <WH1687>

Draw <WH4900> me not away with the wicked, <WH7563> and with the workers <WH6466> of iniquity, <WH205> which speak <WH1696> peace <WH7965> to their neighbors, <WH7453> but mischief <WH7451> is in their hearts. <WH3824>

Give <WH5414> them according to their deeds, <WH6467> and according to the wickedness <WH7455> of their endeavors: <WH4611> give <WH5414> them after the work <WH4639> of their hands; <WH3027> render <WH7725> to them their desert. <WH1576>
Because <WH3588> they regard <WH995> not the works <WH6468> of the LORD, <WH3068> nor the operation <WH4639> of his hands, <WH3027> he shall destroy <WH2040> them, and not build <WH1129> them up.
Blessed <WH1288> be the LORD, <WH3068> because <WH3588> he has heard <WH8085> the voice <WH6963> of my supplications. <WH8469>

The LORD <WH3068> is my strength <WH5797> and my shield; <WH4043> my heart <WH3820> trusted <WH982> in him, and I am helped: <WH5826> therefore my heart <WH3820> greatly rejoices; <WH5937> and with my song <WH7892> will I praise <WH3034> him.
The LORD <WH3068> is their strength, <WH5797> and he is the saving <WH3444> strength <WH4581> of his anointed. <WH4899>
Save <WH3467> your people, <WH5971> and bless <WH1288> your inheritance: <WH5159> feed <WH7462> them also, and lift <WH5375> them up for ever. <WH5769>
